description:
The Nai is the Romanian panflute, In old times the preferred solo instrument of the gypsy-taraf. A lot of famous panflutists from our time has come from the romanian tradition. Zamfir is the first one that springs into ones mind. But Damian Luca has also been quite succesfull doing "International" easy listening stuff - and movie soundtracks(!). The Damian Luca and Dorel Manea records included in this torrent is typical electrecord sound with the occasional dangerously gypsy sounding tune.
FÃƒâ€žÃ†â€™nicÃƒâ€žÃ†â€™ Luca is the Godfather of Nai, introducing the instrument in the golden era of 'Bucharest-Tango' or early sub-urban lauteasca. Youll recocnize the style if youve listened to Dona Dumitru Siminica or Ioana Radu. He was the teacher of allmost everyone of the next Nai generation (counting Zamfir, Damian Luca and Radu Simion). 
Wikilink: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fanica_Luca
Youtubelink:- Damian Luca with some of the best new generation lautarii
